snippet.title: WonderSwan Longplay [006] Rainbow Islands: Putty's Party (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

Port of the Arcade game, but this time featuring Putty instead of Bub and Bob. It retains almost all of the elements from the original, the most notable being the secret door to gain access to a power-up. This version also adds some extensive plot though the text is in Japanese.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
